Literature.Title: Peptides from the scorpion Vaejovis punctatus with broad antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Ramírez-Carreto S, iménez-Vargas JM, Rivas-Santiago B, Corzo G, Possani LD, Becerril B, Ortiz E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.5µM),Streptococcus agalactiae(MIC=2.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=24.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=2.5µM),Candida albicans(MIC=6.25µM),Candida glabrata(MIC=>50.0µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=17.4±6.4µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis(MIC=4.8±1.5µM)
